name: sips
title: Image Modification
description: Rotate, flip, resize, and convert images using SIPS
author: HelloImSteven

commands.name: rotate
commands.title: Rotate Images
commands.description: Rotate the selected images by the specified amount of degrees

commands.name: convert
commands.title: Convert Images
commands.description: Convert the selected images to the specified format

commands.name: resize
commands.title: Resize Images
commands.description: Resize the selected images to the specified width and/or height

commands.name: scale
commands.title: Scale Images
commands.description: Scale the selected images by the provided factor

commands.name: pad
commands.title: Pad Images
commands.description: Pad images to the specified size using the provided color

commands.name: apply-filter
commands.title: Apply Image Filter
commands.description: Apply filters to images using Apple's CIFilters

preferences.description: The preferred file manager to obtain selected images from. Finder will always be used as a fallback.
preferences.name: preferredFileManager
preferences.title: Preferred File Manager
